# selectedText

**Instance Property**

The current selected text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var selectedText: String { get }
```

## Accessing text information

- **text**: The text contents of the current image analysis.
- **selectedAttributedText**: The current selected attributed text.
- **hasText(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether active text exists at the specified point.
- **hasActiveTextSelection**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a person or the app has text selected within the image.
- **analysisHasText(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the analysis finds text at the specified point.
- **hasDataDetector(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the analysis detects data at the specified point.
